game.beginning: In a world where magic has vanished, ancient technology lingers in ruins.
game.ending: The fate of the last remaining city hangs in balance as players confront the dark force behind its downfall.
game.synopsis: In a desperate bid to reclaim their world's lost power, players delve into an abandoned research facility where they uncover remnants of long-lost technologies. Guided by cryptic logs and fragmented memories, they piece together the mysteries of their civilization's collapse. Unraveling the truth, however, will not only reveal the cause but also threaten the delicate balance between human ingenuity and the reemergence of a force more powerful than magic itself: technology.
game.title: Echoes of Eternity
